website_summaries.verdict: Focuses on tips and advice for improving your score, including proven strategic help.
pros: Works well for someone who's pressed for time
Strives to help students understand the style of the questions that will appear on the actual SAT, providing better comprehension
cons: May not provide the all-around detail that some students need to get started

customer_reviews.title: I got a 1550 and could not be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This book was absolutely worth it. Barrett changed my whole perspective on the test and really helped me understand what I needed to do in order to get a high score. He clearly explains how the SAT is made and why understanding this is so crucial to doing well on it. I used this book all summer to study for my SAT and got a 1550 on my first try!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Graham

customer_reviews.title: It gives you results if you give it time
customer_reviews.text: I read this book so carefully and took so many notes that I can say I literally spent at least three entire days with it. And it payed out! Went from 1220 to 1460.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good book but not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to study before taking the SAT for the second time. She took a few of the college board practice tests, using this book as a guide to understand the correct answers. I had high hopes and thought it would help. Her score in Language/Reading went up 10 points and her math score dropped (which I do not blame the book for). This book would be best for a more self-disciplined and independent learner willing to put the hours into understanding the techniques described in this very big book. Every kid is different, but ultimately we found a local prep class more useful for increasing scores.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: THE best guidance for increasing SAT scores.  Just ask our high-scoring kids.
customer_reviews.text: Our teaching center helps kids who want to do well on the ACT and SAT, and also help those who did not get good scores do better the next time around. We have tried every product out there, and ALL of the kids do well following the strategies outlined in this book -- and some with some very dramatic increases over a short time. It's absolutely the best guidance on SAT strategies (and their ACT book, too). You will NOT be disappointed. Please know you do have to buy the Official ACT guide to make the best use of the guidance, however.
customer_reviews.author: KEK

customer_reviews.title: The Best SAT Prep Book!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to clearly understand what to expect on the SAT and how best to prepare for the test, buy this book. I've studied on Khan Academy which is a great resource. I've also grappled with the Barron's math, which had such ridiculously multi-layered and complicated problems that I felt like my brain was going to explode. Then I started on the Black Book, snd everything came together. I couldn't recommend this book more highly.
customer_reviews.author: CNH

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely bad.
customer_reviews.text: It does not cover the real SAT tests that were the exam questions. And no major different strategy than what all standard SAT Prep books already give. I bought it based on a very positive review I read- how it helped him given his short window for prep. Such a misleading review. My money just thrown into garbage. Because I wrote in it, I did not return. Sad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gg527

customer_reviews.title: Packed with strategy
customer_reviews.text: My son bought the Black Book on the recommendation of his friend. Mind you, he's tried other SAT books. This one, he says, is the very best. Rather than test drills and rote learning, he says this book gives test-taking strategy. He's been reading it page by page every day. As opposed to other books, this one makes him want to learn. His friend's scores improved with this book, and he's confident that it will do the same for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The content is good but quality is honestly trash.
customer_reviews.text: I received my book with the front and back cover inwards outward upside down. So try to imagine the black book cover and back is inside out on my book so the white part is out and exposed not the physical covers ; and then upside down to add to the confusion, like honestly how does this even happen? Poor quality book
customer_reviews.author: Salamata

customer_reviews.title: Useless unedited and so densely written it is impractical.
customer_reviews.text: Omg. Have the authors ever heard of an editor?? This is the worst review book I have ever seen. A mess of rambling unedited lengthy musings that is so dense overblown and overwritten that it is worthless. You need a prep course just to learn how to use this prep book...
customer_reviews.author: basstub

customer_reviews.title: My daughter really enjoyed this book - she felt that it gave her ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoyed this book - she felt that it gave her a real inside look at how best to study for the SAT's.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Baisley

customer_reviews.title: If You Study It All, It's Highly Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This book is a phenomenal tool for understanding HOW to take the test. It treats the test as a separate entity from the subject-based matters regularly taught in a classroom, and specifically programs you to beat the College's Board's rules and design patterns within the test. Although I don't recommend buying this book alone if you're preparing for the SAT (you should also purchase the Official SAT Blue Book, as well as a vocabulary tool if you need it), this book will raise your score significantly (and maybe even help you score perfectly) if you truly follow the strategies. Use it wisely!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Matin

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comprehensive SAT prep book I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comprehensive SAT prep book I have found! I tutor high school students for the SAT and this book enables me to zero in on specific difficulties they have. There are practice exercises in the book and helpful hints to strengthen students' test-taking skills.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Margaret

customer_reviews.title: This book should be banned
customer_reviews.text: The advantage this book gives its readers is so enormous that it borders on warranting a ban. The thing is, SAT has a structural peculiarity that can be exploited to achieve much higher scores. The book identifies this peculiarity, and teaches you how to take full advantage of it. Once you you see what is going on, there is no going back: taking the test becomes a game, and the high score becomes a testament to your game-playing skills.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Smiling after a 3 hour standardized test?!
customer_reviews.text: I got the SAT Prep Black Book to help my son prepare for the PSAT. He just got back from that test and is feeling pretty good. He says that the preparation he did using the author's techniques and reading the explanations made him feel confident about the test. He was especially proud to have seen many “test smart” 30 second solutions on the math sections. I will add that he used to be very uncomfortable with all timed tests, so it was good to see him smiling when I went to pick him up! Now for the long wait until the December score release.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very good, if you have the wherewithal to get through the text
customer_reviews.text: I think this book offers good advice, and I incorporate some of the guidance into my work with students, but I haven't seen a single student be able to use it on his or her own, as its pages are all densely packed text. I work with students because they can't even be bothered to read the brief explanations at the back of a typical Kaplan book. This book is 500+ pages of just those explanations (albeit much better-written).
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 5 stars because "so far so good". What the author says about understanding the "strategy" of SAT test-taking makes sense. As they say "the proof is in the pudding". My daughter will take the SAT again on March 14th. Hopefully her scores will improve....substantially. I will try to remember to update this review once those scores are in.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Best SAT prep book!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book for my daughter in July and she used it to prepare for the August SAT. She planned out a schedule so that she was reading/working through questions a little each day...or every couple of days. I am so proud of her! Her score went from a 1240 to 1360! She would never have improved that much without this book! The author writes it in a way that is very easy to understand and his strategies really work!! I highly recommend this book and I am so thankful that I didn’t need to spend thousands of dollars on an SAT prep class.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: awfully small pronted letters!
customer_reviews.text: My reading hasn't completed so I still wait on review but it is awfully small letters to read. I don't know why they made this way ,they should consider readers rather than saving papers. Poorly designed for readers. tooo much content and hard to read. easily get tired of the books!
customer_reviews.author: junga jang

customer_reviews.title: Walk-Through Questions  Align to Khan's Practice Tests
customer_reviews.text: My only hesitation in ordering this book was that we didn't have the College Board "Blue Book." While you can download these tests directly from the College Board, they are also the exact tests used on Khan Academy. My daughter had already taken several of the tests, so she's working through the walk-throughs of the questions she missed. Highly recommend, particularly for high scorers.
customer_reviews.author: kim zartman

customer_reviews.title: Very basic
customer_reviews.text: As a math tutor, I bought this book hoping to find newer and "the most effective strategies", based on the highly positive reviews. This book has no new content and it walks through the college board tests. Use free college board answers and explanations!!! The book is thick for no reason. No major effective strategies. If you want a perfect score in Math, go to a prep center or get a tutor. This book is the paid version of college board explanations (free). I don't know what are the most effective strategies that this book has to offer, may be "taking the test" ?
customer_reviews.author: David Kyaw Lin

customer_reviews.title: Essentially the only helpful SAT review book
customer_reviews.text: After spending a great deal of time helping my older children "study" for the SAT by trial and error I came upon The Black Book. Now my younger two children are learning real strategies for applying what they already know. They now understand that it's not a guessing game. The book gives thorough explanations on solving real SAT practice questions. I also emailed Mike with some questions and he promptly replied with an email that really resonated with my 11th grader. Don't buy other practice books. This one and the College Board practice tests are all that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Dannette Kallay

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide. I'm proved scores
customer_reviews.text: Son increased SAT score by 30 points in 1 month. ACT by 5 points. He didn't even read 1/2 the book. He'd already taken school sponsored class before original tests. But book made the difference. Wish I'd bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: lifeisfunny

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this to anyone serious about prepping for the SAT!
customer_reviews.text: This book has truly changed my perspective on the test as a whole. On the reading passages, I was doing the exact opposite of the correct method, and reading the correct method boosted my performance on the reading section. The writing and math toolboxes are also extremely helpful because they put all the the relevant information in one place, which made it simple and convenient to learn. I also loved the conversational style of writing, for it kept me more engaged. All in all, I would recommend this book to anybody that is highly motivated to increasing their SAT score!
customer_reviews.author: Elleana Majdinasab

customer_reviews.title: Increased score significantly
customer_reviews.text: My son is a senior and took the SAT last year. We got this book for him to use to prepare for the SAT this year with only a week to prepare using it. He was amazed at how well the "walk throughs" prepare the reader in detail, while giving good rules of thumb for how to address the problems. With only a few days to use the book, his score went up by over 100 points. He has signed up for another test and this time is using the book weekly because it really impressed him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful resource
customer_reviews.text: As a first generation student, I say with confidence that this book has been an incredibly useful guide for how I should approach SAT prep. I mean this literally when I say that I have checked out 5 SAT prep books from my local library (Princeton Review, Kaplan, College Board 2x, McGraw Hill Education), but this book has been the most useful in every category by far.
customer_reviews.author: Simone-Nicole Angelov

customer_reviews.title: This book has changed my mindset about the SAT exam.
customer_reviews.text: Literally The Most Effective book for SAT. Now, I am more confident when solving the questions and can actually solve the tricky questions which I never thought I could. It is a very organized, detailed and quite easy to read which I certainly was not expecting. The best advice I would give is to read the entire book at least two times since I could understand some things better the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Meryem

customer_reviews.title: Great Condtion
customer_reviews.text: Came just as expected! Really expensive book but hopefully it’s worth it. I’ll tell y’all my score when I start studying and take the SAT to reveal if this book really helped me which I hope it does!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Score increased by 80 points after reading the book!
customer_reviews.text: This book helped my son go from an average of 1480 in practice tests before reading the book to a 1560 in the actual test! Very helpful, would recommend. The Black Book is written in a friendly tone and contains useful summaries of tips, as well as helpful walk-throughs for questions in practice tests.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: is fantastic. The best way to really raise your SAT ...
customer_reviews.text: This book, while initially daunting, is fantastic. The best way to really raise your SAT score--especially the math portion.
customer_reviews.author: Family of four

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful with practical strategies
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most prep books that basically reiterate the obvious, such as using process of elimination to choose the best answer and pacing, the black book contains various strategies that can actually be used against real SAT questions. Though I do not have numerical evidence yet to back up my claim since I've currently only taken the PSAT, reading the strategies and answering questions released by CB and comparing my thoughts to the walkthroughs have significantly increased my test taking confidence.
customer_reviews.author: WeonYoung Jung

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful SAT Prep
customer_reviews.text: The strategies were extremely useful. The book helps you to think in terms of how questions are written, and how to avoid common SAT mistakes. The most important aspect however, was the walkthrough of the four college board official practice tests. Seeing how the author describes questions, and how exactly they should be approached is very valuable. Plus the author is extremely helpful when it comes to SAT knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Best SAT Prep Book
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been studying this book for 3 months now and my PSAT score went from a 940 to a 1460!! Let me tell you, it is WORTH IT and REALLY HELPFUL
customer_reviews.author: Keana

customer_reviews.title: Best SAT prep ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great Prep for the SAT! Everything you need to know with just a book! Though it might look enormous and hard to read, it's not! Most of the book is an in-depth walkthrough of the first 4 SATs with questions clearly explained (much better than the SATs "explanations"). It helped me get up to a 1570 on my practice SATs, and I'm confident I can do even better on the real one!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: This truly is the best SAT prep book.
customer_reviews.text: I had many concerns about the SAT, but this book put all of those to rest. The black book thoroughly explains the rules which the College Board has implemented in their tests. The author has provided walkthroughs for every single problem in each of the first four practice tests from the College Board. Overall, this book is the best you can get for understanding the SAT and raising your scores.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book
customer_reviews.text: The book is very good! My son said that the book shows him the technique and the method to do the reading and writing parts. I can see the much difference before and after the read the book and watched the video. The video is very, very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Trinh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: It is obvious that Mike Barrett has had plenty of experience educating high schoolers, and he has done a terrific job putting his research and experience into a valuable tool which would be useful for anybody planning to take the SAT. I found other SAT books to be much less useful than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this book to me and I'm so thankful she did! I went through the whole book this past summer to prepare for the SAT, and I scored higher than I ever imagined I would. As a junior, I'll have more time to focus on classes at school now since I don't have to worry about the SAT anymore. 99% of the strategies in this book are super super helpful and easy to follow and implement! This is the only SAT book I would ever recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, you still have to study a ton, but this will keep you from wasting time studying the wrong things. And it analyzes the way each question was designed, and why each specific WRONG answer was chosen by college board, so that you can easily spot them.
customer_reviews.author: robodude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Helps you understand the method behind the questions and how to approach each type. Very detailed
customer_reviews.author: Deb Riester

customer_reviews.title: If you kid can make sense of the book, they don’t need it!
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. So unintuitive to use you’d have to have a PhD to make sense of it. Save your $ and use the online version that SAT/ACT makes available for free.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Amazing book.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book. I like the way he goes over each question and explains the strategies. I only wish he had. Explained the various math concepts and English grammar more deeply so that this book would be all that is needed for sat prep.
customer_reviews.author: Vasu

customer_reviews.title: One only needs the college board study guide if he has the black book
customer_reviews.text: An easy and strait forward Guide to the SAt Test. The clarity of analysis and the repetitiveness of the way the rules and concepts of the Sat work makes learning and understanding effortless. The book gave me the feeling of private tutoring without having to pay a $100 or more per hour. The Black Book is an extension of the college board study book with more analysis of the questions right and wrong answers. No other material would be needed to feel more prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Reem Azzam

customer_reviews.title: Great book but!
customer_reviews.text: On one hand, the book is 600 pages long; only 150 is content and the rest is repeating what the 150 said. Furthermore, the font is extremely small. On the other hand, the strategies are good as well as its advices (sometimes it contradicts Erica’s and Phu’s advices though).
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: So i read the reviews and then purchased this book for my daughter who is a Junior in High School. She read half the book and received and increase of 150 points from her PSAT, she made a 1160. She will be taking again in June and looking to make a 1250.
customer_reviews.author: Arlanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing explanations
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen better explanations for the SAT than those in this book. It's absolutely outstanding because it groups common errors into categories that you can make sense of and can relate to so that you don't make the same mistake twice - especially in the reading section.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mathai

customer_reviews.title: This is indeed a good guide book
customer_reviews.text: I am a test prep tutor. This is indeed a good guide book, but it's not super user-friendly. To get the most out of it, it needs to be used in conjunction with the latest official SAT study guide. It would be more helpful if it actually told you what pages to find particular questions in the official study guide. It does make clear the mindset a student needs to use while practicing for the test. This is the only supplemental SAT guide I recommend to my students.
customer_reviews.author: gaffy

customer_reviews.title: good book but...
customer_reviews.text: Generally a good book with good strategies. Have you noticed there is a grammar error on the cover of the book?
customer_reviews.author: shouying

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t even use this when I bought it hahah. From what I did read through it looks like a good quality book, but it’s honestly a waste of time when there are better online study sources.
customer_reviews.author: Julianah

customer_reviews.title: I love these books
customer_reviews.text: I love these books!! They are awesome. I am a tutor and use them to help my students score high
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Really Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book has helped my daughter practice for the SAT and she now feels prepared so, this is a good book to my daughter in her opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KIRTI

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter found this book very helpful. It is full of thoughtful tips and tricks to use, and was honest about the SAT process. However, there was more repetition than needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kavij

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one and buy a simpler one
customer_reviews.text: Too much reading to be useful. I teach teens and this is not user-friendly despite being good content.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff tries it

customer_reviews.title: Amazing book, very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book is a godsend. The tips for the reading and writing sections especially helped me, and the question walkthroughs are incredibly helpful. This is 100% worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ahimsa

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It’s an interesting perspective on the exam, but using the skills suggested I only raised my score by 50 points.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Malo

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book for my little brother. he PASSED his SAT with no sweat thanks to the long hours he spent studying this old thing. Thanks. Great product id recommends to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Due to the country shut down my daughter could no longer do 1-on-1 tutoring. She say this book really has helped
customer_reviews.author: aisha davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for coaches
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely thorough (long! Detailed!) explanation of how to excel. I don’t think a student could benefit because it’s so dense, but coaches can. The authors are very thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Came in time
customer_reviews.text: The box it’s self was damage but the book wasn’t hurt at all. It arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Carla P. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This book is amazing!! It gives so many useful tips for the sat. I recently took the sat and used this book, it highered my score by over 100 points! I highly recommend it. It’s the best investment to higher your sat score.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This book is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This book is fantastic. I learned more about the SAT from this book than any other SAT book I've purchased. It's second to none. You will not find the information in this book in any other SAT book. Mike and Patrick Barrett did a wonderful job in making this book. I will forever recommend this book to anyone who will take the SAT.
customer_reviews.author: mohammad jaber

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Condition
customer_reviews.text: Book came to me with pages torn and glued back together. Multiple pages had huge pieces of tape all the way across. The formatting was skewed on every page so that you couldn't read the top line of text. It was a mess. The book was said to be brand new, but when received, it looked like it had been cut up and put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie

customer_reviews.title: Only for 2 tests
customer_reviews.text: This book explains SAT practice test from 1 to 4. It is great book but college board removed test 2 and 4, so you can only study test 1 and 3 with this book.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! It helped my daughter SO MUCH. Every answer and rationale for practice questions is in it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K Herriage

customer_reviews.title: No BS
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! After I took the SAT for the first time (without any understanding of the test) I got a very low score. I realized I needed to get a better score to be a good applicant for a certain college. When I took it for the second time my score went up 600 points!! Highly recommend this straightforward no bs textbook!
customer_reviews.author: samiyah

customer_reviews.title: Best SAT prep book
customer_reviews.text: The best prep book; the only prep book I trust. Provides effective test taking strategies. Does not lie to you.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Gal

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: Kahn academy is more useful, this is all basically just rambling.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Rae

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: was not helpful at all, too repetitive with useless information
customer_reviews.author: ct

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement to the blue book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book but the ACT version and I enjoyed that one so much I thought this one would be great for SAT prep. It is a must have if you’re prepping for the SAT!!!!!! If anything, get this and the official Blue Book and you should be fine!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Tran

customer_reviews.title: The only book you will need to get the score you need for SAT
customer_reviews.text: This book is probably the best book out there for SAT. I would highly recommend you this book no matter what score you have/want on the SAT. The writer basically helps you understand the concept of the SAT and the structure of the test and gives you all the strategies you need to do good on the test.
customer_reviews.author: Rizvan

customer_reviews.title: SAT tips.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy to read. Info is repetitive but has many useful tips. Hoping it delivers on increasing the SAT scores by 200 points.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable for serious SAT preparation.
customer_reviews.text: This book, along with "The Official SAT Study Guide, is absolutely effective in preparing to take the SAT. Outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: hikerboy

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter found this book very helpful in preparing her for the S.A.T.!
customer_reviews.author: VB Mangolds

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Read!
customer_reviews.text: This book is very easy to read, unlike other SAT prep books. I don’t really like to read but I can sit down and read this for an hour or two with no problem. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dulce S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap binding. Came apart
customer_reviews.text: Terrible binding. Came apart within a couple weeks of using book.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Christy

customer_reviews.title: The Best Prep Book Ever
customer_reviews.text: This SAT Prep book is amazing. This book has ridiculous strategies that you can find nowhere else, not even from an expensive SAT program. This book also has very awesome and detailed explanations. Go buy this book. I promise you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Tavakoli

customer_reviews.title: yep
customer_reviews.text: Highschool junior here, definitely helps the studying process. make sure you get some flash cards too
customer_reviews.author: debbie lostaunau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: The book came in perfect condition literally. There are no stains or writing of any kind in it. The pages arent crumbled at all, as if I bought one brand new. I cant tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Maria IglesiS

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Great book for my son to prepare for his SAT
customer_reviews.author: Tat Lam

customer_reviews.title: Best SAT Prep Book on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and study with! Highley recommend for all types of students :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not address difficult problems
customer_reviews.text: Not as well organized as the College Board publication. It obfuscates how to solve the problems. A terrible text.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: where have the margins gone?
customer_reviews.text: I am leaving a review not for the content of the book, but only the printing. There is no margin in this printing at all. I do not like that style.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: The most helpful and useful SAT prep book!
customer_reviews.text: at first I didn't believe there is an effective way of answering SAT questions, but after using the book I can certainly say I feel confident about being successful on the test!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for planning your child's education or at least summers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Book content
customer_reviews.text: The book came fast. It came the next day with free shipping. This book is really helpful and breaks everything down for you without sugarcoating. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chanelle

customer_reviews.title: Need updated version
customer_reviews.text: The book is great. The issue is the college board took down practice tests 2 & 4 so his explanations are only helpful for 2 practice tests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Condition is Great
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was okay but not the best. Although, the book was in great condition and quality. Very useful for studying SAT techniques.

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read. This book got me 150 points back on the SAT in 1 month of studying.

customer_reviews.text: This book just arrived and seems used - the cover is completely bent in multiple places. Disappointing.

customer_reviews.text: Amazing book!! A must have for students who want to increase their score quickly.

customer_reviews.title: The book works!
customer_reviews.text: My sons SAT score went up 200 points!!! Thanks for the TIPS
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding SAT book
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding SAT prep. Really focuses on test taking strategies and understanding the way the SAT is written (and why). Explanations make sense and add a ton of value. A must have in the SAT prep book category.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect SAT prep book
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 would recommend. This book is perfect for those who want >1500 on their sat

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: The book completely rewired my understanding of this crucial test. I can't recommend it enough!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Young

customer_reviews.title: Great, comprehensive, and detailed explanation of the SAT
customer_reviews.text: I've been training using the ACT black book for some time now, and thus far I have moved my ACT score up a good 5 points. Once I saw the second edition of the SAT black book drop, I knew I had to buy it. The explanations and walkthroughs are extremely helpful as are each and every strategy! My SAT score has since climbed from a 1200 to a 1460! I look forward to even more improvement for the future
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cahill
